currentQuote.text: Security is not a product, but a process.
currentQuote.author: Bruce Schneier

currentQuote.text: The only safe system is one that's powered off, cast in a block of concrete and sealed in a lead-lined room.
currentQuote.author: Gene Spafford

currentQuote.text: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
currentQuote.author: Steve Wozniak

currentQuote.text: Cybersecurity is much more than a matter of IT.
currentQuote.author: Stephane Nappo

currentQuote.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
currentQuote.author: Alan Kay

currentQuote.text: Cloud computing is a model for enabling ubiquitous, convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources.
currentQuote.author: NIST

currentQuote.text: Privacy and security are those things you give up when you show the world what makes you extraordinary.
currentQuote.author: Margaret Cho

currentQuote.text: If you spend more on coffee than on IT security, you will be hacked. What's more, you deserve to be hacked.
currentQuote.author: Richard Clarke

currentQuote.text: Ethical hacking is a key component of cybersecurity in the 21st century.
currentQuote.author: Kevin Mitnick

currentQuote.text: The cloud is just someone else's computer.
currentQuote.author: Anonymous

currentQuote.text: Security used to be an inconvenience sometimes, but now it's a necessity all the time.
currentQuote.author: Martina Navratilova

currentQuote.text: Hacking is not a crime; it's a methodology.
currentQuote.author: Anonymous

currentQuote.text: In the cloud, we trust but verify.
currentQuote.author: Werner Vogels

currentQuote.text: It's not a matter of if, but when.
currentQuote.author: Anonymous
